ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.title: To the Stars![--飞向太空!--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests0.d: The &bNASA Workbench&r is used to &6craft Rockets&r.[--&bNASA工作台&r用于&6制作火箭&r.--]
There are &6four tiers&r; naturally, you have to make the first one first.[--火箭一共有&64级&r;你需要从第一个开始制作.--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests1.d: Once you've crafted your &bRocket&r, place it down on a &bLaunchpad&r.[--制作了&b火箭&r后,你就可以把它放在&b发射台&r上.--]
Sneak right-click a placed Rocket to open its GUI. Here, you can insert &6Fuel&r and insert up to 8 items for it to store.[--潜行右键单击放下的火箭来打开GUI。在这里,你可以插入&6燃料&r并最多插入8个物品来存储.--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests2.d: The &bFuel Refinery&r converts &6Oil&r into &6Fuel&r, for use in Rockets.[--&b燃料精炼厂&r将&6矿石&r转化为火箭的&6燃料&r.--]
You can get Oil either using the &6Fluid Drill&r from &eIndustrial Foregoing&r, or through &eProductive Bees&r.[--你可以使用&e工业先锋&r的&6流体钻头&r或通过&e资源蜜蜂&r获得石油.--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests3.d: It's a little-known fact that &cyou can't breathe in space&r. Well, you &ocan&r, but only out, and only once.[--众所周知，&c你不能在太空呼吸&r。 好吧,实际上&o可以&r。但是只有呼出的那一次.--]
A &bSpace Suit&r is incredibly useful to have, as it keeps the air in and the space out. Also works under water![--&b太空服&r非常有用,它可以防止空气从衣服中逸散出去,所以它其实也能在水下使用!--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests4.d: The &bOxygen Loader&r is used to &6pull Oxygen from Water&r.[--&b氧气装载器&r用于&6从水中提取氧气&r.--]
Give it Water, either through pipes or Buckets, and provide it with FE power.[--通过管道或桶来给它水,并为它提供FE能量.--]

You can take the converted Oxygen out by filling a &6Buckets&r, &6Oxygen Tanks&r, or a &6Space Suit&r. Using an Oxygen Tank will fill your Space Suit.[--你可以通过填充&6桶&r、&6氧气储罐&r或&6太空服&r来取出转换的氧气.氧气储罐可以给你的太空服充氧.--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests5.t: Pre-flight Check List[--飞行前检查列表--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests5.d: • It costs &6three buckets of Fuel&r to launch a Rocket. Make sure you have enough for a return trip![--•发射火箭需要&63桶燃料&r。走之前一定要确保你有足够的燃料返航!--]
• &6Bring a Launch Pad&r with you! You can't launch without one.[--•记得&6带上发射台&r!没有发射器,火箭就无法发射.--]
• When you reach your destination, you'll be in a &6freefalling Lander&r. &cHold space to slow down!&r[--•当你到达目的地时,你将乘坐&6着陆器自由落体&r.&c按住空格来减速!&r--]
• You will &6land at the same coordinates you launched from&r, just in a different dimension.[--•你会&6降落在&r和发射地点的相同坐标处&r,只是在一个不同的维度.--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests6.s: I can see my house from here![--我从这里可以看到自己的房子!--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests6.d: If you have the proper materials in your inventory, you can make a &bSpace Station&r orbitting one of the major astral bodies.[--如果你背包里有相关材料,你可以制作一个围绕星球旋转的&b空间站&r.--]
Basically, it's an &6expandable skyblock structure&r, which generates at the same coordinates you launched from.[--基本来说,它是一个&6可扩展的空岛结构&r,在你发射的同一个坐标上产生.--]
Completing either task will complete the quest.[--完成任意一个任务都会完成任务.--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests7.s: One small step for man[--人类的一小步--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests7.d: &bThe Moon&r is a barren wasteland, (mostly) devoid of life.[--&b月球&r是一个贫瘠的荒原,(一般情况下)没有生命.--]
Underground, you can find &6Desh Ore&r, which is integral to progression.[--你可以在地下找到&6戴斯矿石&r,这是完成进度的必要部分.--]
You can also rarely find &6dungeons&r and &6Lunarian villages&r![--你也可以找到罕见的&6地牢&r和&6月球村庄&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests7.t: Land on the Moon[--登陆月球--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests8.s: Make a Fuel Loader[--做个燃料装载器--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests8.d: The &bFuel Loader&r will &6automatically fuel Rockets&r within 2 blocks of itself.[--&b燃料装载器&r会&6在2个方块内自动为火箭提供燃料&r.--]
It will also refill the &6Rover&r.[--它还会给&6漫游车&r填充燃料.--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests9.s: There's only one tier[--只有一级--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests9.d: The &bRover&r is a vehicle, powered by Fuel, that lets you &6quickly explore&r.[--&b漫游车&r是一个用燃料供能的载具,可以让你&6快速探索&r月球.--]
Probably less useful back home.[--到家就没用了.--]
Now in orange![--现在变成橙色了!--]
With access to Desh, you can make the &bTier 2 Rocket&r.[--有了戴斯,你就可以制作&b第2级火箭&r了.--]
This allows access to &6Mars&r.[--这是去往&6火星&r的必要条件.--]
Mark Watney; Space Pirate[--太空海盗 马克·沃特尼--]
&bMars&r is &oalso&r a barren wasteland, mostly.[--&b火星&r也是个荒原.--]
There's no natural life, no dungeons, and only a single featureless structure to be found.[--没有自然生物,没有地牢,只能找到一个没什么特征的结构。--]
It's also the only known source of &6Ostrum&r, a highly heat-resistant material.[--它还是&6紫金&r的唯一已知来源,这种材料有高度耐热的特性。--]
The &bTier 3 Rocket&r can take you to both &bMercury&r and &6Venus&r![--&b3级火箭&r可以将你带去&b水星&r和&6金星&r!--]
The &bCryo Freezer&r converts &6Ice Shards&r (which can be found as an ore on cold planets) into &6Cryo Fuel&r.[--&b深低温冷冻器&r可以将&6冰晶&r(可以在寒冷的星球上找到作为矿石)转化为&6深低温燃料&r.--]
&6A single bucket of Cryo Fuel&r can fuel a Rocket trip![--&6一桶深低温燃料&r可以为火箭飞行提供燃料!--]
Netherite Space Suit[--下界合金太空服--]
The &bNetherite Space Suit&r provides &6complete heat resistence&r, which is a strict requirement for Mercury and Venus.[--&b下界合金太空服&r提供&6完整的热防护&r,刚好符合水星和金星的严苛要求.--]
Space is just chock full of barren wastelands. &bMercury&r and &bVenus&r are two more examples of such.[--太空充满了贫瘠的荒原。&b水星&r和&b火星&r是另一个例子。--]
Due to their proximity to the sun, a &6Netherite Space Suit&r is required to not &cburn up&r.[--由于它们靠太阳太近,所以需要&6下界合金太空服&r才能不&c被烧成灰&r.--]
Both planets also have &6Calorite Ore&r.[--两个星球都有&6金星耐热金属矿石&r.--]
Reach Mercury or Venus[--到达水星或金星--]
That's all she wrote[--她留下的东西--]
The &bTier 4 Rocket&r provides access to the Proxima Centauri star system, which currently only contains the planet &bGlacio&r.[--&b四级火箭&r可以访问半人马星系统,目前它只包含行星&b霜原星&r.--]
There's nothing on Glacio, either.[--霜原星上什么也没有.--]
The &bJet Suit&r is the final tier of Space Suit. In addition to providing oxygen, this one also provides &6flight&r![--&b喷气套装&r是太空服的最后一个等级。除了提供氧气外,还能提供&6飞行&r!--]
While powered with FE, hold space to fly, and hold space and control to boost like an Elytra.[--用FE供能时,可以按住空格飞行,按住空格并按住方向键可以像鞘翅一样飞行.--]
Technically an asteroid belt[--严格来说,这是一条小行星带--]
With a &6Tier 1 Rocket&r, you can &bfly to the End&r![--有了&6一级火箭&r,你可以直接&b飞到末地&r!--]
